meanings.sent1: She outdrove her friends in the golf game.
meanings.sent2: He outdrove the competition in the long drive contest.
meanings.sent3: The little car outdrove the big trucks on the highway.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outdrove any doubts she had.
meanings.sent5: The champion outdrove all expectations with her performance.
